name: Queen Sized
description:
There once was a peaceful city... until mattresses were made illegal! [GAME IN DEVELOPMENT] Features:

-5 Diffent zones!

-15 Types of enemies! (3 per zone)

-5 Completely unique bosses!

-Lots of skills! Some belong to enemies, some you can buy in the shop!

Controls:

Everything: Left Mouse Button

Useful Rules!

-Every 5 enemies you defeat, there's a shop! This shop will contain upgrades and skills that will help you out!

-This shop will NOT contain any skills you already have

-There is no mana! Instead, skills cost an ammount of turns/uses.

-Guarding cuts the damage you'll take the next turn in half!

-You can carry up to 4 skills at the same time.

-You have a special skill! (Heal). It doesn't run out, but has a recharge time instead

Soundtrack!

Listen to the game's OST on Bandcamp

https://fungalvoiid.bandcamp.com/album/queen-sized-ost

Or Soundcloud!

https://soundcloud.com/user-964352012/sets/queen-sized-ost

Any support to this project will help me keep it updated.

hope u like it!! <3

[v1.0.1]
